title: Tuples
question: Which of these statements about tuples are true?
hint: Tuples are fixed in size and the types can't be changed after they are created.
correct: You can't change the types of tuple items.
You can access tuple items using numerical positions.
Tuples are created by placing items inside parentheses.
Tuples store values together in a single value.
wrong: Tuples are the same as arrays.
All values in a tuple must be unique.
Tuples must always be created as variables.
